projectInfo.name: AWS EOL Dashboard
projectInfo.description: End-of-life tracking dashboard for AWS resources

tasks.title: Integrate AutoSpectra Testing Framework
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive testing automation with Playwright, accessibility testing, and performance monitoring
tasks.notes: Successfully integrated comprehensive testing framework with multi-browser support, accessibility compliance testing, and performance monitoring.

tasks.title: Implement VS Code Integration
tasks.description: Set up comprehensive VS Code workspace with extensions, tasks, debug configurations, and code snippets
tasks.notes: Complete VS Code integration with recommended extensions, custom tasks, debug configurations, and code snippets for improved developer experience.

tasks.title: Create Project Management System
tasks.description: Implement Shrimp Task Manager inspired project management capabilities with task tracking, planning, and progress monitoring
tasks.notes: Creating comprehensive project management system with task tracking, dependency management, and progress monitoring.

tasks.title: Enhance AWS Data Collection
tasks.description: Improve AWS resource data collection scripts with better error handling and additional service support
tasks.notes: Expand AWS service coverage and improve data collection reliability.

tasks.title: Implement Real-time Notifications
tasks.description: Add real-time notifications for EOL alerts and system updates
tasks.notes: Implement push notifications and in-app alerts for critical EOL events.

tasks.title: Add Export Functionality
tasks.description: Implement data export capabilities for reports and resource lists
tasks.notes: Support multiple export formats including CSV, JSON, and PDF reports.

tasks.title: Performance Optimization
tasks.description: Optimize application performance for large datasets and improve loading times
tasks.notes: Focus on chart rendering performance and table virtualization for large datasets.

tasks.title: Security Audit
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive security audit and implement security best practices
tasks.notes: Review authentication, authorization, data handling, and API security.

tasks.title: Documentation Update
tasks.description: Update all project documentation including API docs, user guides, and deployment instructions
tasks.notes: Comprehensive documentation update covering all new features and integrations.

tasks.title: Production Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy application to production environment with monitoring and alerting
tasks.notes: Final production deployment with full monitoring, logging, and alerting setup.
